level10: Improved Combat Superiority - Your superiority turns into d10's.
Combat Superiority - You learn two additional maneuvers.
level15: Relentless - When you roll initiative and have no superiority dice remaining, you regain  1 superiority die.
Combat Superiority - You learn two additional maneuvers.
Superiority Dice - You gain one additional superiority die.
level18: Improved Combat Superiority - Your superiority turns into d12's.
level3: Student of War - You gain proficiency with one type of artisan’s tools of your choice.
Combat Superiority - You gain four superiority dice and learn three maneuvers.
level7: Combat Superiority - You learn two additional maneuvers.
Superiority Dice - You gain one additional superiority die.

Know Your Enemy - If you spend at least  1  minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its capabilities compared to your own. The DM tells you if the creature is your equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two of the following characteristics of your choice: •  Strength score•  Dexterity score•  Constitution score•  Armor Class•  Current hit points•  Total class levels (if any)•  Fighter class levels (if any).
name: battle master
